entry.title: Precise Timing With Web Animations API
entry.summary: In JavaScript, it‚Äôs natural to reach for timers when something is to happen on time. But when something is to happen at the exact moment because other things depend on it, you quickly learn timers are more of a problem than a solution. They are never on time, really. Web Animations API could eliminate the need for timers in certain cases while being precise.

entry.title: Simplify Your Color Palette With CSS Color-Mix()

entry.title: Digital Museums For Digital History
